short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction

Unix Timestamp Converter is a Chrome extension designed to convert Unix timestamps into human-readable date and time formats. This tool is especially useful for developers, data analysts, and anyone needing to work with timestamps, enabling quick and accurate time conversions to improve efficiency.

Features

1. User-Friendly: An intuitive interface allows for easy input and conversion of Unix timestamps.
2. Instant Conversion: Quickly obtain readable dates and times without complex calculations.
3. Multi-Timezone Support: Select different time zones as needed to ensure the conversion aligns with your requirements.
